description:
My first C++ project ever! Submitted for OLC CODEJAME 2020

files/github:

https://github.com/thomaslantern/Quest-For-the-Great-Machine

CONTROLS:

Use the arrow keys to move Adam the robot.

Press "R" to restart level

Press "Q" to restart game

Sorry the UI/UX is not all there, this is as far as I could get! Thanks for trying it out.
